alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 1:40AM PST until February 02 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THURSDAY TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Lincoln County. * WHEN...From 10 AM Thursday to 4 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult on Highway 93 north of Pioche, across Oak Springs Summit Pass west of Caliente, and on Highway 379 east of Panaca.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
